titleStmt.title: A peace-offering in the Temple; or, A seasonable plea for unity among dissenting brethren: in a sermon at St. Paul's Church, London, before the Right Honouable the Lord Mayor, &c. on the 14th of October, 1660. By Richard Henchman, Rectour of St. James-Garlick-Hyth.
titleStmt.author: Henchman, Richard, d. 1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Roycroft, for William Grantham, at the sign of the Black Bear in St. Paul's Church-yard near the little North-Door,

notesStmt.note: Thomason copy bound with items from 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Black Bear in St. Paul's Church-yard near the little North-Door
